Straight Shot nods in reply.  She had tried hard to not make the situation =
appear too severe.  Yet she didn't quite appreciate the fact that Leo Prime=
's voice sounded a bit ominous.  She goes to Leo but with a bit of a seriou=
s expression on her face. 

" Leo, please, I think Elita might've picked up=
 on your tone of voice.  We know how serious the situation is but try expla=
ining that to a little girl who misses her parents so much that it breaks h=
er heart just at the mention of something as horrible as this."

She looks =
up to him with a look of desperation.

" Please, try not ta send any negati=
ve statements if she's around?"

Perpetually on the move and constantly bus=
y. 

On Sep 4, 2011, at 6:30 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> w=
rote:

>> <OLD>
>> 
>> Elita: Elita woke up and looking around said "Where =
is my mommie?"
>> 
> 
>> 
>> Straight Shot swallows hard.  She knew she had=
 to tell the truth and sits
>> beside Elita while gently rubbing her head.
=
>> 
>> " Your mom is on an important mission to see if she can bring your d=
ad
>> back to the Ark.  She asked Talon and me to keep ya safe and watch ov=
er
>> ya.  She also told us that if something ever happened to her that she=

>> would like Tucson and Talon ta be your guardians.  She loves you very m=
uch
>> and she knows that Talon and Tucson will love you just as much, as i=
f you
>> were their daughter.  And you can bet that Tucson is gonna spoil y=
ou
>> rotten.  Anything you want, he'll do for you".
>> 
> 
>> 
>> "I could=
 have helped her"sobbed Elita"I want my parents back!!!"
>> 
> 
>> 
>> Stra=
ight Shot embraces Elita with a supportive arm and holds her lovingly.
>> "=
 Hey, things will go well, I promise you.  She will succeed I know she
>> w=
ill.  Besides, with Tucson out there, I'm sure he has a handle on what's
>>=
 going on and he never strays too far from any of us.  Plus he has the aeri=
al
>> advantage and from there, he can see anything.  His eyes will be on e=
veryone
>> including your mom, and if trouble arises, I bet he'll be right =
there to
>> help."
> 
>> 
>> Elita sobbed and talon glenty touched the litt=
le one
>> 
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> LEO PRIME stood looking at NIGHTLIGHT=E2=80=99s =
door - He had come looking for
> NIGHTLIGHT and instead heard ELITA=E2=80=
=99s calls for her mother and the
> general response. He could hear the voi=
ces on the other side of the
> door as clearly hearing a conversation next =
to him, his own heightened
> senses serving him in ways he had not intended=
.
> 
> He frowned as they talked. They were evidently trying to help ELITA,=

> but he knew that if TUSCON was in the jungle he was far too far away
> t=
o help anyone right now, and if the jungle was as dangerous as the
> report=
 had received from POLAR CLAW, the TUSCON had his own troubles
> to worry a=
bout.
> 
> LEO pressed the door buzzer. He hoped NIGHTLIGHT hadn=E2=80=99t =
done what he
> thought she had done. =E2=80=9CTalon, Straightshot we need t=
o talk.=E2=80=9D He said
> calmly, but with a certain edge.
